Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Spring Crop Festival</RED>. If
you want to participate, grab a <BLUE>crop
harvested in spring</BLUE> and come talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Summer Crop Festival</RED>. If
you want to participate, grab a <BLUE>crop
harvested in summer</BLUE> and come talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Fall Crop Festival</RED>. If
you want to participate, grab a <BLUE>crop
harvested in fall</BLUE> and come talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Winter Crop Festival</RED>. If
you want to participate, grab a <BLUE>crop
harvested in winter</BLUE> and come talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Beekeeping Festival</RED>. If you
want to participate, grab a <BLUE>beekeeping
item</BLUE> and come talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Cooking Festival</RED>. If you
want to join, grab a <BLUE>soup
or salad</BLUE> and come talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Cooking Festival</RED>. If you
want to participate, get a <BLUE>grilled or
pot dish</BLUE> and come talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Cooking Festival</RED>. If you
want to join, grab a <BLUE>rice, bread, or
noodle dish</BLUE> and talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Cooking Festival</RED>. If you
want to join, grab a <BLUE>dessert or
drink</BLUE> and come talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Crop Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Cooking Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Beekeeping Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Cow Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Chicken Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Sheep Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Alpaca Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Llama Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Yak Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Music Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Fireworks Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>8:00 PM and 10:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Foliage Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Snow Festival</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Countdown</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>9:00 PM and 11:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Critter Fest: Start</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Critter Fest: Result</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Fishing Fest: Start</RED>. 
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Fishing Fest: Result</RED>.
I'm still getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is the <RED>Pumpkin Festival</RED>. I'm still
getting ready so come back
between <BLUE>12:00 PM and 3:00 PM</BLUE>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're participating? Then pick the
class you'd like to join.
Beginner's Class
Intermediate Class
Advanced Class
Don't participate
Hear info on prizes

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Beginner's Class?
Participate
Don't participate

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Intermediate Class?
Participate
Don't participate

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Advanced Class?
Participate
Don't participate

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's time to get started. Go on and head
over to the festival grounds.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prize for the Beginner's Class is...
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>!"

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prizes for the Beginner's Class
are... "<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>" and
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>!"

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prizes for the Beginner's Class
are... 
<PAGE>
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>,"
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>," and
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints!"

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prize for the Intermediate Class
is... "<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>!"

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prizes for the Intermediate Class
are... "<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>" and
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>!"

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prizes for the Intermediate Class
are...
<PAGE>
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>,"
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>," and
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints!"

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prize for the Advanced Class is...
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>!"
<PAGE>
Think carefully about which class
you should join.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prizes for the Advanced Class are...
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>" and
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>!"
<PAGE>
Think carefully about which class
you should join.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The prizes for the Advanced Class are...
<PAGE>
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>,"
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>," and
"<GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints!"
<PAGE>
Think carefully about which class
you should join.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today is <RED><MOJI0></RED>.
Will you participate?
Participate
Don't participate

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's time to get started. Go on and head
over to the festival grounds.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now pick the animal you want to enter.
Remember, baby, pregnant, or sick
animals can't be entered.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now pick the bird you want to enter.
Remember, baby chicks and sick birds
can't be entered.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now pick the animal you want to enter.
Remember, sick animals can't be entered.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You haven't picked your animal?
You're not going to join?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going to enter the
<RED><MOJI0></RED>
for the Crop Festival today?
Enter
Don't enter
Vegetable Competition
Fruit Competition
Flower Competition
Other Competition

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you going to enter the
<RED><MOJI0></RED>
for the Cooking Festival today?
Soup and Salad Competition
Grilled and Pot Dish Competition
Rice, Noodle, and Bread Competition
Dessert and Drink Competition

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hold on. You don't have any room in your
bag. I can't give you any prizes unless
you go make some room first.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I'm sorry. The only ones who
can see the results are people who came
to the opening ceremony as participants.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I hope to see you here next year at the
opening ceremony as a participant.
I'll be waiting.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Put down the pet you're holding first,
then talk to me. I can't let you both
participate.
